summary: RECENTLY PURCHASED A 1996 DODGE DAKOTA PU.  I'M HAVING PROBLEMS WITH THE CATALITIC CONVERTER AS THOUGH IT'S CLOGGING UP AND OR FALLING APART INTERNALLY.
